column1: 现在如何坐飞机到危地马拉城

根據美國駐該國使館七月一日的公告，該國邊境關閉： Closing of Borders:  The Guatemalan government is currently barring entry to most non-Guatemalans (with specific exceptions for accredited diplomatic personnel, health and security personnel, and exceptional cases as designated by the Guatemalan government) – by its land, sea, and air borders.  Airport operations and routine commercial flights out of Guatemala have been suspended. https://gt.usembassy.gov/update-for-u-s-citizens-regarding-new-travel-restrictions-by-the-government-of-guatemala-during-covid-19-2/​
我估计去那个国家是没有直飞的飞机的。转机就麻烦多了，不可预知和不可控的因素太多。
太难，至少中转两次飞行。中转地越多，出行可行性越低。
从国内出发？太难！一票难求，也真心不建议！
如果从国内出发，那么目前疫情下没有能够顺利转机的航班可以搭乘。
​你先去美国或者墨西哥再说吧。
有什么事情必须去吗？远程解决不了吗？
